meanings.sent1: The pretyped message was ready to be sent out.
meanings.sent2: She had a pretyped list of questions for the interview.
meanings.sent3: The pretyped note made him smile as he read it.
meanings.sent4: Her pretyped response was like a well-rehearsed script.
meanings.sent5: The pretyped instructions were clear and easy to follow.

meanings.sent1: He pretyped the email before leaving the office.
meanings.sent2: They pretyped the report to save time during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: She pretyped the message so she wouldn't forget to send it.
meanings.sent4: The students pretyped their essays to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent5: We pretyped the labels to speed up the packaging process.
